verses.verse: The priests <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> all the tribe <WH7626> of Levi, <WH3878> shall have no portion <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with Israel: <WH3478> they shall eat <WH398> the offerings <WH801> of Yahweh <WH3068> made by fire, <WH801> and his inheritance. <WH5159>
They shall have no inheritance <WH5159> among <WH7130> their brothers: <WH251> Yahweh <WH3068> is their inheritance, <WH5159> as he has spoken to them. <WH1696>

This shall be the priests <WH3548>' due <WH4941> from the people, <WH5971> from those who offer <WH2076> a sacrifice, <WH2077> whether it be ox <WH7794> or sheep, <WH7716> that they shall give <WH5414> to the priest <WH3548> the shoulder, <WH2220> and the two cheeks, <WH3895> and the maw. <WH6896>

The first fruits <WH7225> of your grain, <WH1715> of your new wine, <WH8492> and of your oil, <WH3323> and the first <WH7225> of the fleece <WH1488> of your sheep, <WH6629> you shall give him. <WH5414>

For Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has chosen <WH977> him out of all your tribes, <WH7626> to stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> him and his sons <WH1121> for ever. <WH3117>

If a Levite <WH3881> comes <WH935> from any <WH259> of your gates <WH8179> out of all Israel, <WH3478> where he lives <WH1481> as a foreigner, <WH935> and comes with all the desire <WH185> of his soul <WH5315> to the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> shall choose; <WH977>
then he shall minister <WH8334> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh <WH3068> his God, <WH430> as all his brothers <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> do, <WH5975> who stand there before <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068>
They shall have like portions <WH2506> to eat, <WH398> besides that which comes of the sale <WH4465> of his patrimony. <WH1>

When you have come <WH935> into the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, <WH3925> you shall not learn to do <WH6213> after the abominations <WH8441> of those nations. <WH1471>

There shall not be found <WH4672> with you anyone who makes his son <WH1121> or his daughter <WH1323> to pass <WH5674> through the fire, <WH784> one who uses <WH7080> divination, <WH7081> one who practices sorcery, <WH6049> or an enchanter, <WH5172> or a sorcerer, <WH3784>
or a charmer, <WH2266> or a consulter <WH7592> with a familiar spirit, <WH178> or a wizard, <WH3049> or a necromancer. <WH1875>

For whoever does <WH6213> these things is an abomination <WH8441> to Yahweh: <WH3068> and because <WH1558> of these abominations <WH8441> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> does drive them out <WH3423> from before you. <WH6440>
You shall be perfect <WH8549> with Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

For these nations, <WH1471> that you shall dispossess, <WH3423> listen <WH8085> to those who practice sorcery, <WH6049> and to diviners; <WH7080> but as for you, <WH3068> Yahweh your God <WH430> has not allowed you so to do. <WH5414>
Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> will raise up <WH6965> to you a prophet <WH5030> from the midst <WH7130> of you, <WH251> of your brothers, like me. <WH8085> You shall listen to him.

This is according to all that you desired <WH7592> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> in Horeb <WH2722> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly, <WH6951> saying, <WH559> "Let me not hear <WH8085> again <WH3254> the voice <WH6963> of Yahweh <WH3068> my God, <WH430> neither let me see <WH7200> this great <WH1419> fire <WH784> any more, <WH4191> that I not die."
Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH3190> "They have well said that which they have spoken. <WH1696>

I will raise them up <WH6965> a prophet <WH5030> from among <WH7130> their brothers, <WH251> like you; <WH5414> and I will put my words <WH1697> in his mouth, <WH6310> and he shall speak <WH1696> to them all that I shall command him. <WH6680>
It shall happen, <WH376> that whoever will not listen <WH8085> to my words <WH1697> which he shall speak <WH1696> in my name, <WH8034> I will require it of him. <WH1875>

But the prophet, <WH5030> who shall speak <WH1696> a word <WH1697> presumptuously <WH2102> in my name, <WH8034> which I have not commanded <WH6680> him to speak, <WH1696> or who shall speak <WH1696> in the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods, <WH430> that same prophet <WH5030> shall die. <WH4191>"
If you say <WH559> in your heart, <WH3824> "How shall we know <WH3045> the word <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> has not spoken? <WH1696>"

when a prophet <WH5030> speaks <WH1696> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> if the thing <WH1697> doesn't <WH935> follow, nor happen, that is the thing <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> has not spoken: <WH1696> the prophet <WH5030> has spoken <WH1696> it presumptuously, <WH2087> you shall not be afraid of him. <WH1481>
